name: Refired
description:
Project 3 - Resistance

                                                                             

A firefighter's work is never done.

You finally get to enjoy retirement on your own private island surrounded by surf, sun, and wood. But fire-spitting slugs are now threatening your happy place!

Time to dust off your old skills-- and your water gun, and protect your home!

                                                                             

Dev Team

Yodhin Singh: UI, Programmer, and Game Designer
Arshad Ousmand: 3D Artist, Level Designer, Game Designer, Arsonist, Voice Actor
Caleb McNalley: AI Coder, Programmer, and Game Designer 
Dylan Bugeja: Programmer, VFX Artist, 3D Artist, Water Boi
Martin Rose-Harriott: Sound Designer, Music Composer, Programmer
